text_block_list.text: A flash of light cut through the horizon.

Even though they were running so far away that I couldn't make 
out their face, I could still hear their breath.

They were running wildly and desperately, but still filled with 
pride. The way they were forging ahead, it was almost like―

Even though I didn't know her name or her face, 
I wanted to see her run again. Even though I 
had searched, I still couldn't find her――

……In the end, even after months of searching, I still couldn't 
find out what her name was, let alone anything else about her.

Since I couldn't think of anything but that 『Hero』, it made me 
want to read a heroic tale. I came looking for a suitable 
biography…… but I just can't seem to find them.
……U-um…… can I help you with anything?

Z-Zenno Rob Roy. T-the librarian……! 
Um, if you're looking for a book, I thought I could help……
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Ah, I-I'm sorry if I'm bothering you!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Biographies……! Now that I think about it, they're in a place 
that's kind of confusing. You won't find them under history, 
they're with the essays and novels.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
You see, biographies often have a lot of fiction 
mixed in. So they're not confused with historical 
facts, they were separated it seems.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Ah, but I think I like them more when fiction is mixed in! When 
you add in anecdotes like that, it helps keep people interested!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Being admired like that, helps it remain in everyone's memory. 
That kind of existence is a hero! That's why, I――
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
I think that's how over time they become a 『Tale of a Hero』! 
That biographies eventually become heroic tales!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Ah, um, no…… that's not true, I'm sorry.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
I was getting excited all on my own…… 
Ah, the shelf with biographies is over there.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: No…… I'm sorry, please excuse me……!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
She suddenly became less energetic…… 『That's not true』 
is what she said but, it was hard to believe that 
she didn't based on how she acted.

Why did she deny it though? While thinking that, I decided to 
search for a book on the shelf she mentioned for now.

I ended up reading through a lot. Like she said, a lot of fiction 
was mixed in but, even then it was still a great heroic story……!

……when a story starts to often be told in a heroic manner, 
it becomes a heroic tale――
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
But my story, hasn't even…… 
No, maybe, it won't ever……
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
choice_data_list: Excuse me, I'd like to borrow this!

text_block_list.text:
Ah…… okay! You'd like to borrow it, right? 
Oh, that book……
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: ……do you like heroic tales?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
choice_data_list: <size=32>I saw a hero-like Uma Musume, so I was interested</size>

text_block_list.text:
That Uma Musume's running was vividly etched in to my mind, so I 
had been searching for her this whole time…… is what I told her.
『A hero-like』 Uma Musume……
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
You couldn't help but feel like she was a hero, even if you only 
saw her running from a distance……is what you said, right?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
An Uma Musume that can run like that, right now, is at Tracen 
Academy is what you're saying, right……!?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
……U-um…… I know we just met today, and I'm aware it's an 
unreasonable request but!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Can you let me help you with that 『Hero Search』!?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
I'm confident in my skills to search for documents and I know a 
lot about heroes! I'll definitely be helpful!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
It was an offer that was incredibly beneficial to me but, when it 
comes to Tracen Academy, shouldn't a student's priority be to run?

I asked Zenno Rob Roy if helping me would 
get in the way of her training.

I-it's fine, I'll make it work! ……I really want to know what made 
Trainer-san feel like that Uma Musume was 『Hero-like』.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: I really want to know! Because――
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
N-nevermind! Anyways, it'll definitely be beneficial for me too. 
So I look forward to working with you……!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
